## packet ssh-key create

Creates an SSH key

### Synopsis

Example:

packet ssh-key create --key [public_key] --label [label]

	

```
packet ssh-key create [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help           Help for create
  -k, --key string     Public SSH key string
  -l, --label string   Name of the SSH key
```
